WorkItem.Description:
When trying to create an excel having colons in file name, i get the following error:


Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'PHPExcel_Writer_Exception' with message 'Could not close zip file __data-2014-07-31-18:26:41.xlsx__.' in C:\xampp\htdocs\test\PHPExcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007.php:348 Stack trace: #0 C:\xampp\htdocs\test\download.php(54): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007->save('data-20...') #1 {main} thrown in C:\xampp\htdocs\test\PHPExcel\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007.php on line 348

File name - data-2014-07-31-18:26:41.xlsx

After removing the colons, the excel is created properly.
WorkItem.Summary: Error saving file with colons in file name

Comments.Message:
That's because you shouldn't have colons in filenames on a Windows PC

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-gb/library/windows/desktop/aa365247(v=vs.85).aspx
